verses.verse: And the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6166>Arad<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5045>South<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> tell that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H871>Atharim<s%>; and he <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H7617>took<s%> some of them <S%H7628>captive<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, If thou wilt <S%H5414>indeed<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, then I will utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> their <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and delivered <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>; and they utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them and their <S%H5892>cities<s%>: and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah<s%>.

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>, to <S%H5437>compass<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>: and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> was much <S%H7114>discouraged<s%> because of the <S%H1870>way<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> against <S%H430>God<s%>, and against <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Wherefore have ye brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>? for there is no <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and there is no <S%H4325>water<s%>; and our <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6973>loatheth<s%> this <S%H7052>light<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5175>serpents<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they <S%H5391>bit<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>; and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, because we have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and against <S%H6419>thee<s%>; pray unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that he take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5175>serpents<s%> from <S%H4872>us<s%>. And Moses <S%H6419>prayed<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H6213>Make<s%> thee a fiery <S%H8314>serpent<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> it upon a <S%H5251>standard<s%>: and it shall come to <S%H5391>pass<s%>, that every one that is bitten, when he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H2425>it<s%>, shall live.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> it upon the <S%H5251>standard<s%>: and it came to <S%H5175>pass<s%>, that if a serpent had <S%H5391>bitten<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%>, when he <S%H5027>looked<s%> unto the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, he <S%H2425>lived<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H88>Oboth<s%>.

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H88>Oboth<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H5863>Iyeabarim<s%>, in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%>.
From thence they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H2218>Zered<s%>.

From thence they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, which is in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, that cometh <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>: for the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, between <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>.

Wherefore it is <S%H559>said<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4421>Wars<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H2052>Vaheb<s%> in <S%H5492>Suphah<s%>, And the <S%H5158>valleys<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>,

And the <S%H793>slope<s%> of the <S%H5158>valleys<s%> That <S%H5186>inclineth<s%> toward the <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> of <S%H6144>Ar<s%>, And <S%H8172>leaneth<s%> upon the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.

And from thence they journeyed to <S%H876>Beer<s%>: that is the <S%H875>well<s%> whereof <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H622>Gather<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H622>together<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H4325>water<s%>.
Then <S%H7891>sang<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> this <S%H7892>song<s%>: Spring <S%H5927>up<s%>, O <S%H875>well<s%>; sing ye unto <S%H6030>it<s%>:

The <S%H875>well<s%>, which the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H2658>digged<s%>, Which the <S%H5081>nobles<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3738>delved<s%>, With the <S%H2710>sceptre<s%>, and with their <S%H4938>staves<s%>. And from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> they journeyed to <S%H4980>Mattanah<s%>;
and from <S%H4980>Mattanah<s%> to <S%H5160>Nahaliel<s%>; and from <S%H5160>Nahaliel<s%> to <S%H1120>Bamoth<s%>;

and from <S%H1120>Bamoth<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> that is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%>, which <S%H8259>looketh<s%> <S%H6440>down<s%> upon the <S%H3452>desert<s%>.
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> through thy <S%H776>land<s%>: we will not <S%H5186>turn<s%> aside into <S%H7704>field<s%>, or into <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>; we will not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H875>wells<s%>: we will <S%H3212>go<s%> by the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1870>highway<s%>, until we have <S%H5674>passed<s%> thy <S%H1366>border<s%>.

And <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> would not <S%H5414>suffer<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through his <S%H1366>border<s%>: but <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> all his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H622>together<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%>; and he <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> him with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%> from the <S%H769>Arnon<s%> unto the <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%>, even unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>; for the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> was <S%H5794>strong<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> all these <S%H5892>cities<s%>: and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and in all the towns <S%H1323>thereof<s%>.

For <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> was the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, who had <S%H3898>fought<s%> against the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and <S%H3947>taken<s%> all his <S%H776>land<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, even unto the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>.

Wherefore they that speak in <S%H4911>proverbs<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H935>Come<s%> ye to <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>; Let the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> be <S%H1129>built<s%> and <S%H3559>established<s%>:

For a <S%H784>fire<s%> is gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, A <S%H3852>flame<s%> from the <S%H7151>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%>: It hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, The lords of the high <S%H1181>places<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>.

Woe <S%H188><s%> to <S%H4124>thee<s%>, Moab! Thou art <S%H6>undone<s%>, O <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%>: He hath <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> as <S%H6412>fugitives<s%>, And his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> into <S%H7622>captivity<s%>, Unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>.

We have <S%H3384>shot<s%> at <S%H2809>them<s%>; Heshbon is <S%H6>perished<s%> even unto <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>, And we have laid <S%H8074>waste<s%> even unto <S%H5302>Nophah<s%>, Which reacheth unto <S%H4311>Medeba<s%>.
Thus <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to spy <S%H7270>out<s%> <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>; and they <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H1323>towns<s%> <S%H3423>thereof<s%>, and drove out the Amorites that were <S%H567>there<s%>.

And they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>: and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H5971>them<s%>, he and all his people, to <S%H4421>battle<s%> at <S%H154>Edrei<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> him <S%H5414>not<s%>: for I have delivered him into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and his <S%H776>land<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> to him as thou <S%H6213>didst<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>.

So they <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H1121>him<s%>, and his sons and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, until there was <S%H1115>none<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> him <S%H8300>remaining<s%>: and they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%>.
